text: Us Girls is a BBC sitcom series that aired for 2 seasons and 12 episodes from 27 February 1992 and 14 April 1993. It stars Joanne Campbell, Mona Hammond and Marlaine Gordon. ==Other websites== * *BBC Comedy Guide Category:1992 television series debuts Category:1993 television series endings Category:1990s British comedy television series Category:1992 establishments in the United Kingdom
title: Us Girls
